Title: Episode #2.5
Writer: Dennis Kelly (creator), Huw Kennair-Jones (original idea), Mark Aldridge (original idea), Clare McDonald (original idea), Dennis Kelly
Actors: Adeel Akhtar, Paul Higgins, Geraldine James, Neil Maskell
Plot: With the revelation that her father is alive, Jessica and Milner set off to find him. Arby takes Grant and Anton to a place from his past, a remote mountainside where he came as a child.
